title: Drug Distribution in Triplicate
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows your robot to distribute drug from a 2 mL Eppendorf tube in triplicate to a 96-well plate. See Additional Notes for tube rack and plate layout. You will need our 4-in-1 Tube Rack Set and the P50 single-channel pipette.
process:
Input your desired volume in the field above.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A1 to plate well A1-A3.
Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A2 to plate well A4-A6.
Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A3 to plate well A7-A9.
Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A4 to plate well B1-B3.
Robot will repeat step 7-11 until all the drugs in the tube rack have been distributed.
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Drug Distribution in Triplicate
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol allows your robot to distribute drug from a 2 mL Eppendorf tube in triplicate to a 96-well plate. See Additional Notes for tube rack and plate layout. You will need our [4-in-1 Tube Rack Set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/tube-rack-set-1) and the P50 single-channel pipette.
markdown.process:
1. Input your desired volume in the field above.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A1 to plate well A1-A3.
8. Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A2 to plate well A4-A6.
9. Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A3 to plate well A7-A9.
10. Robot will transfer drug from tube rack well A4 to plate well B1-B3.
11. Robot will repeat step 7-11 until all the drugs in the tube rack have been distributed.
markdown.notes:
![layout](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/1438-oregon-health-science-university/layouts.png)

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
